name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inboxes: Create Disposable Temp Mail Addresses

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inboxes lets you quickly create & delete temp mail addresses. Stay private and stop spam with this disposable email generator
short.fr: Inboxes vous permet de crÃ©er et de supprimer rapidement des adresses e-mail temporaires. ArrÃªtez les spams avec un email jetable!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let's face it, we've all been there - whether its to access a recipe, or try out a "free" demo. Websites always demand your email address - and it sucks - because you know they'll spam you.

So we made Inboxes App, a super easy to use browser extension which creates long lasting temporary email addresses for you. You can create new email addresses and delete them from within the extension, saving your real email from unwanted marketing messages ðŸŽ‰

There's no sign up required, and Inboxes App has already saved our users from receiving over 12.7 million unwanted messages through the use of disposable email accounts.

By using a long lasting temp mail generator instead of a regular temp email website, you keep access to the address for as long as you want, allowing you to control who you want to be able to contact you.

While sites like 10 minute mail, Guerrilla Mail, mailinator and Temp Mail recycle short term emails, Inboxes lets you keep your address indefinitely offering you even more more privacy than a traditional temp mail.
long.fr:
Let's face it, we've all been there - whether its to access a recipe, or try out a "free" demo. Websites always demand your email address - and it sucks - because you know they'll spam you.

So we made Inboxes.app, a super easy to use browser extension which creates long lasting temporary email addresses for you. You can create new email addresses and delete them from within the extension, saving your real email from unwanted marketing messages ðŸŽ‰

There's no sign up required and Inboxes.app has already saved our users from receiving over 2.5+ million unwanted emails. Creating temp emails has never been easier.

ðŸ“² New: Premium users can now use their own domain names on Inboxes App and get their own personal inbound SMS Phone Number. Never give out your personal phone ever again and stop receiving nuisance calls.
